name: Johnny Split
description:
Johnny's legs got separated from the rest of him. They run around in a top-down view and Johnny is stuck in a classical platformer.

I combined a classic platformer with a top-down perspective to create a challenging and enjoyable experience.

Important: Seems like I have messed something up with resolution in build. To fix this set the size of this page to 80%.

Every feedback, every comment and rating are SUPER appreciated.

Thanks for playing - Tyrannosaurus Games

P.S.

I know it can be hard, but try to finish the game. Just for the ending. Trust me. It's worth it.
